definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: Significant micro- and macro-adjustments are in the works.
sentences.chinese: 微观面和宏观面的重大调整仍在进行之中。

sentences.english: Enterprise's outside migration is one of the results of industry structure adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 企业外迁是经济发展过程中产业结构调整的微观显现。

sentences.english: In this paper we consider a model simulating the ecological" phenomena in a chemostat."
sentences.chinese: 本文考察恒化器模拟生态现象的一类微观模型。

sentences.english: The physical and chemical properties of the carbon black are detected, and its microstructure is analysed by High Revolution Electromicroscopy (HREM) and X-ray Diffraction.
sentences.chinese: 射线衍射和高分辨率透射电镜分析了样品的微观结构。

sentences.english: Between the macroscopic and the microscopic.
sentences.chinese: 而宏观量与微观量之间。

sentences.english: You have fallen into the micromanagement trap.
sentences.chinese: 你已经陷到“微观管理陷阱”里了。

sentences.english: Moreover govt is doing nothing for the growth of micro level industries.
sentences.chinese: 更重要的是，政府没有为微观层面行业做任何事。

sentences.english: The mechanism of splitting type rock burst of round chamber is analyzed from microcosmic viewpoint.
sentences.chinese: 从微观角度分析了圆形硐室片帮型岩爆发生机制。

sentences.english: Effect of microstructure characteristics of Ga-based sorbents on SO2 removal was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了钙基脱硫剂的微观结构特性对烟气脱硫的影响。

sentences.english: Microstructure and alloyed elements are the major factors to determine material properties.
sentences.chinese: 微观组织和合金元素是决定材料性能的主要因素。

sentences.english: The microphotographs of SEM indicated the change of microcosmic morphology.
sentences.chinese: 扫描电子显微镜分析了表微观形貌的变化。

sentences.english: One is micro-management inwhich no freedom or trust is given.
sentences.chinese: 一个是微观管理，不给任何自由和信任。

sentences.english: This thesis discusses pricing policy of the stockbroker companies from both macroscopical and microcosmic aspects.
sentences.chinese: 本文从宏观经济和微观层面探讨了券商的定价策略。

sentences.english: From the viewpoint of microscopic and phenomenological analyses, a rubber friction theoretical model was developed.
sentences.chinese: 由微观和唯象分析建立了橡胶粘附摩擦的理论模型。

sentences.english: At the microlevel, professors managing the university and presidents role being highlighted should be implemented.
sentences.chinese: 微观层面上，实行教授治校，突出校长角色。

sentences.english: In the same vein, Mr. Ballmer is not a big believer in  micromanagement.
sentences.chinese: 同样的，巴尔默也不太相信微观管理。

definition: epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
the objective world (as opposed to empirical observation)
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
